column3: looking at the menu I was shocked. Because I thought since this place was buzzing I would be getting some quality stuff. It's just plain American breakfast foods: pancakes
column5: and a few different Benedict's. Â Now I've had amazing meals from different places of each of those. This wasn't one of those places. Not will I ever wait in line again for them. It's not special. To be fair it's not bad either. If that's your thing. You can get most of those things
column7: at several places around town. So I'm not buying the craze.
